modules.description: Parses SPDX license expressions according to the official specification, handling combinations like "AND" and "OR" with precise syntax validation. It works with strings representing license identifiers and complex expressions, including exceptions and version ranges. Use it to verify license compliance in software packages or generate structured license metadata.

Parses SPDX license expressions into a structured format, including user-defined licenses, simple licenses, and compound expressions with AND/OR operators. Converts parsed licenses back to standardized SPDX format strings and provides lists of currently valid license and exception identifiers. Validates input against SPDX specifications to ensure compliance with license expression syntax and approved identifiers.
